selections.name: Stern Dispute
selections.reason: Showed excellent promise on debut at Gosford (Provincial level), finishing 3rd and hitting the line hard. Drops to Country grade here and the form line is superior to rivals. The one to beat.

selections.name: Chistota
selections.reason: Solid debut effort when 5th at Port Macquarie. Will be better for the experience and draws well.

selections.name: Riga
selections.reason: Resuming from a spell. Showed glimpses of ability in first campaign and has trialled well enough to contend here.

selections.name: Risk And Famous
selections.reason: Resuming. Trials have been okay and draws the inside gate. Watch for market moves.

danger_horse.name: Chistota
danger_horse.reason: Only other runner with a competitive debut run on the board.

selections.name: Oakfield Universe
selections.reason: Standout selection. Coming off a strong 2nd at Wyong (Provincial) where she raced on speed. This is a significant drop in class and she should dominate this field.

selections.name: Double Or Quits
selections.reason: Ran a solid 2nd at Kembla Grange last start. Proven at this level and draws the rails.

selections.name: Cool Summer Nights
selections.reason: Resuming. Showed ability in lone start and looked sharp winning a recent trial.

selections.name: Elegant Force
selections.reason: Finished midfield at Beaumont last start. Can improve into the placings.

danger_horse.name: Double Or Quits
danger_horse.reason: Provincial form lines stack up well here.

exotic_strategy.strategy: Win Bet #5 (Best Bet of the Day). Exacta 5 / 1,7.

selections.name: Our Pappy
selections.reason: Resuming from a long spell but looked very sharp winning a trial at Port Macquarie recently. Finds a very winnable race first-up.

selections.name: Markwell Music
selections.reason: Consistent performer who ran a decent 4th at Coffs Harbour recently. Will be in the mix.

selections.name: Blue Dane
selections.reason: Improved effort to finish 3rd at Taree last start. Trending in the right direction.

selections.name: The Simple Life
selections.reason: Experienced mare who has placed at this track before. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Markwell Music
danger_horse.reason: Fitness edge over the top pick.

selections.name: Fighting Magnus
selections.reason: Racing consistently. Finished 3rd at this track and distance last start. Looks ready to win.

selections.name: Charmed Destiny
selections.reason: Finished 4th in the same race as the top pick last start. Won at Taree prior to that. Major player.

selections.name: Amalfi Amore
selections.reason: Won well at Tuncurry two starts back on heavy ground. Failed last time but can bounce back on Soft 5.

selections.name: Maui
selections.reason: Finished 6th here last start. Has the ability to feature if things go right.

danger_horse.name: Charmed Destiny
danger_horse.reason: Proven winner at this track and distance.

selections.name: Dollars
selections.reason: Excellent run for 2nd at Newcastle (Provincial) last start. Drops significantly in class to Country level. Should be too strong.

selections.name: Mortlake
selections.reason: Another dropping in class, coming off runs at Canterbury and Warwick Farm (Metro). Will find this much easier.

selections.name: Dwayne
selections.reason: Won his maiden two starts back. Failed at Scone but can improve here.

selections.name: Winters Ending
selections.reason: Finished 3rd at Tuncurry last start. Place claims.

danger_horse.name: Mortlake
danger_horse.reason: Metro form is always dangerous in Country grade.

selections.name: Cashaway Gold
selections.reason: Resuming. Won first-up last preparation at Quirindi. Trials have been solid. Looks the one to beat fresh.

selections.name: Bethsheba
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track and distance. In good form and draws well.

selections.name: Singing Star
selections.reason: Finished 5th at Tamworth resuming. Will be fitter for that run and has ability.

selections.name: Canny Prospect
selections.reason: Finished 6th at Dubbo last start. Draws the inside and can improve.

danger_horse.name: Bethsheba
danger_horse.reason: Hard to knock a last-start winner on the same track.

selections.name: King Soleil
selections.reason: Finished 2nd at this track last start, narrowly beaten. Consistent and due for a win.

selections.name: Thedaythemusicdied
selections.reason: Won at this track last start, beating King Soleil. Must be respected again despite the weight swing.

selections.name: Cupid's Kiss
selections.reason: Ran a strong 2nd at Beaumont last start. Draws the rails and is in good form.

selections.name: Sheila's Fanta Sea
selections.reason: Finished 4th at Scone last start. Has a tricky gate but has the ability to contend.

danger_horse.name: Thedaythemusicdied
danger_horse.reason: Proven winner at the track/distance last start.

selections.name: Satono Invader
selections.reason: Progressive filly. Won her maiden then finished a good 2nd at Port Macquarie. On an upward trajectory and draws perfectly.

selections.name: Fast Blue
selections.reason: Finished 3rd at Taree last start. Consistent type who is usually around the mark.

selections.name: Talana
selections.reason: Finished 6th at Taree last start. Drops in class here and gets the inside draw.

selections.name: Khant Fail
selections.reason: Finished 3rd at Bowraville. Place chance from a good draw.

danger_horse.name: Fast Blue
danger_horse.reason: Consistent and handles the track well.
